survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their experience at automotive dealerships, focusing on sales process, service quality, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall experience at the dealership?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall experience at the dealership?

questions.question_text: Which of the following services did you use at the dealership? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture various interactions.

script.question_text: Which of the following services did you use at the dealership? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific issues you encountered during your visit.
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to allow detailed feedback on negative experiences.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific issues you encountered during your visit.
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'

questions.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism of the sales staff?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 includes 'Vehicle purchase' or 'Vehicle lease'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for evaluating staff professionalism.

script.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism of the sales staff?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 includes 'Vehicle purchase' or 'Vehicle lease'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and comfort of the dealership's facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and comfort of the dealership's facilities?

questions.question_text: Did the dealership provide clear and transparent pricing information?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 includes 'Vehicle purchase', 'Vehicle lease', or 'Financing'
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/partial response to evaluate transparency.

script.question_text: Did the dealership provide clear and transparent pricing information?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 includes 'Vehicle purchase', 'Vehicle lease', or 'Financing'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this dealership to friends or family?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this dealership to friends or family?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing this dealership?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 includes 'Vehicle purchase' or 'Vehicle lease'
questions.client_notes: Allow single selection to identify key decision factors.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing this dealership?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q2 includes 'Vehicle purchase' or 'Vehicle lease'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the follow-up communication after your visit?
questions.client_notes: Include an option for no follow-up to capture gaps in communication.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the follow-up communication after your visit?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the dealership experience?

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving the dealership experience?
